mapper.select: SELECT cct.course_code, cct.course_name FROM course_cd_tb cct WHERE cct.course_code BETWEEN 0 and 119 ORDER BY cct.course_code
SELECT cct.course_code, cct.course_name, cct.room FROM course_cd_tb cct ORDER BY cct.course_code
SELECT student_course_id ,student_id ,course_code ,period ,status FROM student_course WHERE student_id = #{student_id}::integer

SELECT sc.student_course_id ,sc.student_id ,sc.course_code ,sc.period ,sc.status ,sc.room ,cct.course_name ,cct.lock_yn FROM student_course sc left join course_cd_tb cct on sc.course_code = cct.course_code where status = 'O' and student_id = #{student_id}::integer

SELECT sc.student_course_id ,sc.student_id ,sc.course_code ,sc.period ,sc.status ,sc.room ,cct.course_name ,cct.lock_yn FROM student_course sc left join course_cd_tb cct on sc.course_code = cct.course_code where status = 'Y' and student_id = #{student_id}::integer
SELECT course_code FROM student_course WHERE student_id = #{student_id}::integer AND period = #{period} AND status = #{status}
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET student_count = student_count - 1 WHERE course_code = #{course_code}::integer AND substring(period,1,1) = #{period} AND room = #{room}
UPDATE course SET student_count = student_count + 1 WHERE course_code = #{course_code}::integer AND substring(period,1,1) = #{period} AND room = #{room}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (max_seats - student_count) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM course WHERE course_code = #{course_code}::integer AND substring(period,1,1) = #{period} AND room = #{room}
SELECT student_course_id FROM student_course WHERE student_id = #{student_id}::integer AND period = #{period} AND status = #{status}
SELECT room FROM student_course WHERE student_id = #{student_id}::integer AND period = #{period} AND status = #{status}
mapper.update: UPDATE student_course SET course_code = #{nextCourseCode}::integer, room = #{room} WHERE student_course_id = #{student_course_id}::integer
mapper.select: SELECT course_id, course_code, course_name, period, room, student_count, max_seats, teacher_name, created_at FROM course ORDER BY course_name, period;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_history ( course_id, before_student_count, before_max_seats, after_student_count, after_max_seats, changed_by ) SELECT course_id, student_count, max_seats, #{student_count}, #{max_seats}, #{student_id} FROM course WHERE course_id = #{course_id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_code, c.course_name as target_course_name, g.min_grade, g.max_grade FROM course_grade_condition g JOIN course_cd_tb c ON c.course_code = g.course_code ORDER BY c.course_name

SELECT cg.target_course_code, c.course_name as target_course_name, cg.group_no, string_agg(rc.course_name, ' + ' ORDER BY rc.course_name) as required_courses FROM course_condition_group cg JOIN course_condition_item ci ON ci.condition_group_id = cg.condition_group_id JOIN course_cd_tb c ON c.course_code = cg.target_course_code JOIN course_cd_tb rc ON rc.course_code = ci.required_course_code GROUP BY cg.target_course_code, c.course_name, cg.group_no ORDER BY c.course_name, cg.group_no
